events.message: I just received my order yesterday, but the product has a large scratch on the screen which makes it unusable.
The reported issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to the presence of visible damage on delivery.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the case regarding the scratched product.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help resolve the problem as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched area and confirm if you would prefer a replacement or a refund?
Thanks for your quick reply. I’ve attached pictures showing the scratch. I would prefer a replacement if possible.
We have reviewed your photos and will send a replacement immediately. You will receive the tracking details shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt response and handling the replacement so quickly.
The replacement product has been shipped and is on its way. We hope this resolves your issue satisfactorily.
Just checking in to ensure the replacement arrived in perfect condition and that you are satisfied with the solution.
We are closing this case now as the replacement has been delivered and no further issues were reported. Thank you.
